overview: Meet Lanz Priestley, a charasmatic homeless man, who owns nothing but a phone and a Facebook page. When Lanz discovers taps have run dry in drought-stricken outback Australia, he raises the money to deliver drinking water himself.

production_companies.name: Australian Film Television and Radio School (AFTRS)

tagline: When taps run dry in the drought-stricken outback. Lanz sacrifices himself to help.
title: Where Is My Darling?
